definition.text: The Github Storage Container node idetifies a particular public github repository as an Open Storage location on the Superalgos Peer to Peer Network.

paragraphs.text: codeName This property defines the name associated with the Open Storage Container used within the Superalgos system.
Use this name to help easily identify this storage container. A good naming convention is to use the type of storage container, your profile name, and the storage container's use together.
githubUserName This property defines the Github Profile that owns this Open Storage Container (in this case public github repository.)
repositoryName This property defines the name of the public github repository being used as an Open Storage Container.
